fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.

fields.name: type
fields.desc: The kind of material to show (e.g., card or canvas). This affects the shape of the widget, the roundness of its corners if the shape is rectangular, and the default color.

fields.name: elevation
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.material.elevation} The z-coordinate at which to place this material relative to its parent.

fields.name: color
fields.desc: The color to paint the material.

fields.name: shadowColor
fields.desc: The color to paint the shadow below the material.

fields.name: surfaceTintColor
fields.desc: The color of the surface tint overlay applied to the material color to indicate elevation.

fields.name: textStyle
fields.desc: The typographical style to use for text within this material.

fields.name: shape
fields.desc: Defines the material's shape as well its shadow.

fields.name: borderOnForeground
fields.desc: Whether to paint the [shape] border in front of the [child].

fields.name: clipBehavior
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.Material.clipBehavior} The content will be clipped (or not) according to this option.

fields.name: animationDuration
fields.desc: Defines the duration of animated changes for [shape], [elevation], [shadowColor], [surfaceTintColor] and the elevation overlay if it is applied.

fields.name: borderRadius
fields.desc: If non-null, the corners of this box are rounded by this [BorderRadiusGeometry] value.
